name: Ruins of Theragan
description:
Ruins of Theragan is a 2D TTRPG style adventure game set in medieval fantasy world where you take control over a party of 4 adventurers that pull together to protect a village against bandits. However, their story doesn’t end there. They will need to step up to become heroes that will save the world from a great evil not only by heroic fights but also by solving puzzles and mysteries.

The game is inspired by DnD based games such as Baldur's Gate or Icewind Dale but in contrast the combat is turn based and strategic. The underlying combat system is developed solely for the purpose of this game. 

This game was created in one semester as part of the Computer Games Development course at Charles University in Prague by the Dapper Cat team:

  • Jiří Filek – lead programmer (combat, balancing, pathfinding)
  • Martina Fusková – game designer (combat system, writing, locations design, UI design), sound designer (SFX and ambients)
  • Lucie Gašparínová – artist (characters, animations, weapons)
  • Shivam Sharma – UI programmer (dialogue system, UI), QA tester
  • Robert Wiesner –  programmer (fog of war, minimap, particles)

Licensing and credits:

  • Soundtrack of this game was created by HaF
  • Additional sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
